<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_mispers_action_item"> <x_snc_mispers_action_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <address/> <assigned_to display_value="James Luxford">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</assigned_to> <case display_value="MISPERS0001002">6a009c311b745990db301f83b24bcb9a</case> <due_date>2023-07-20 17:55:00</due_date> <id>2751157</id> <notes>Initially an Experian check can be useful in ascertaining contact details for the missing person as well as identifying their financial footprint.
Missing Person Team have financial investigation capabilities. If urgent and outside of missing person team 0700x2200 hours use HR Skills Search to find other trained officers. FIB also have financial capabilities, please consult ext 2655
More extensive opportunities (with banks) are available for TTL cases.</notes> <number>ACTION0001032</number> <report_reference>10</report_reference> <start_date>2022-07-20 17:55:00</start_date> <status>Approved</status> <summary>true</summary> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-09-06 08:31:58</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8173cb8d1bf59190db301f83b24bcb0c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-09-06 10:59:47</sys_updated_on> <title>*MPT TASK* Financial Enquiries</title> <type>Financial</type> </x_snc_mispers_action_item> </record_update>
